News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 2nd April
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 2nd April
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 2nd April
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with two Premier League games being shown live on Sky Sports. At 13:30pm Swansea take on Middlesbrough at the Liberty Stadium with both teams fighting to beat the drop. While at 16:00pm Manchester City travel to the Emirates to take on Arsenal with both of the teams looking to qualify for the Champions League. 

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
